meanings.definition: The quality or state of being oval in shape.
meanings.sent1: The ovalness of the mirror made my reflection look distorted.
meanings.sent2: The artist emphasized the ovalness of the face in the portrait.
meanings.sent3: The ovalness of the egg rolling off the table was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The ovalness of the moon in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The ovalness of the basketball hoop made it challenging to score.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having an oval shape.
meanings.sent1: The ovalness of the rug made the room feel more spacious.
meanings.sent2: The ovalness of the lake was perfect for kayaking.
meanings.sent3: The ovalness of the pizza slice made it look like a boat.
meanings.sent4: The ovalness of the window frame framed the view beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The ovalness of the table made it stand out in the room.
